text: haey puokke ban niyeay tha chetd robsa puok yeung mean koum rb bet chit nouv avei del anak kampoungte ampeavneav puok yeung towkean vea . haey now knong trachiek robsa puok yeung mean chhnok chok . haey rveang puok yeung ning anak( mou ham meat) mean rneang bang . dau che neah chaur anak anouvotd tam meakra robsa anak choh pitabrakd nasa puok yeung ka anouvotd tam meakra robsa puok yeung der
